translations.transtext: 2. A verdict of mindfulness may be given. This is the verdict of innocence given in an accusation, based on the fact that the accused remembers fully that he did not commit the offense in question.
๒. พึงให้ระเบียบยกเอาสติขึ้นเป็นหลัก
2. The procedure (setting up) mindfulness (as the main point) may be given.
